channel.title: Time Format on
channel.description: Recent content in Time Format on

item.title: Change KDE 4 panel clock to 12hr from 24hr military
item.description: It’s not that I can not read 24 hour time, it’s just a pain to deal with on a daily basis. I was raised with 12 hr, and its just quicker for me to read. So if you are running KDE4 and you would prefer 12 hour format in your panel read on.
